notesStmt.note: Translation of: Histoire l'ambassade envoyée en 1686 par les Suisses au duc de Savoye.
Attributed to Antoine Teissier. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Includes translation of the Duke of Savoy's edict concerning the Waldenses.
